Interface PurchaseController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vendingmachinesareus.AbstractHardwareListener, com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButtonListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Iteration2PurchaseController

    public interface PurchaseController
extends com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButtonListener
    The Interface PurchaseController. Classes which implement this interface will be the main controller for the vending machine during a purchase and controls the payment, dispensing and updating of stock of pop
